introduction.name: Michael Medis
introduction.description:
Solutions-diven engineer with a magnetic pull to software. Specializing object-oriented
		programming design and well versed in in all phases of the software development lifecycle. With a dynamic
		background in Rails and Javascript frameworks AngularJS and React. A lifelong learner and always open to new
		technoligies as well and being disciplined to mastering all parts of development.

experiences.name: Bloc Full Stack Web Developer Track
experiences.subText:
Full Stack Apprentice. Fulfilled 133% of curriculum on Both Rails and Frontend Web
					Development Tracks
experiences.description:
Web Development Apprenticeship with a Foundation in Ruby, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript,
					JQuery, ReactJS, and AngularJS.

involvement.description:
Graduated with over 100% complete. Built production level applications and APIs with
							the newest technoligies in software development.

Focus in Backend and Frontend technologies. Projects were built with Rails, AngularJS,
							Sass, Stripe, Mailgun, and Firebase

Designed and Published three Amazon Alexa Skills in Node.js.
							These skills can be found on the Alexa Skill store.

experiences.name: Water Out of North East Florida
experiences.description:
First on secne at a emergency water damage event. Would stablize the
					area and start the recovery process.

involvement.description: Would use the highest technology in water removal process.

Emergency situation, keeping a level head and breaking the situation
							into smaller and more managable parts. Set up a set opf protocols to handle any situation.

experiences.technologies: FIR Infared Camera, Water Out Trailor, and Dehumifiers.

experiences.name: Screen Enclosure Lighting
experiences.description: Set up and Install State-of-the-Art LED lighting system.

involvement.description:
Would map the electical wiring for the system, use critical thinking to
							establish a plan of action with each custom job.

Install and wire each light and follow the protocol to have each custom job
							properly designed.

experiences.technologies: LED lights, transformers to manipulate electical current and power.

experiences.name: National Multiple Sclerosis Society North Florida Chapter
experiences.subText:
Multiple Sclerosis Foundation to improve the quality of life for people
							affected by MS in North Florida and raise funds for critical MS research.

involvement.description: Have attended and provide support at several events.

Been actively participating in Education Seminars and assiting
									patients at these events.
Helped with yoga classes that our held for MS patients.
